creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
See also Bug 20856 ("W3C validator complains: 'Fatal Error: No DOCTYPE 
specified!'")

this happened when cocoon could not connect to w3c org. fixed by removing the
doctype declarations
creator: gregor@apache.org
